name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High
description: The sneaker that started it all — timeless court heritage with premium leather, bold color blocking, and unmatched versatility.

name: Air Jordan 4 Thunder
description: Striking design with iconic mesh panels and bold accents, built for explosive performance and everyday street style.

name: Air Jordan 11 Concord
description: Legendary silhouette featuring patent leather shine, championship pedigree, and a sleek design that defines sneaker culture.

name: Air Jordan 3 Retro Black Cement
description: Iconic elephant print overlays with premium leather construction, delivering retro style and all-day comfort.

name: Air Jordan 5 Fire Red
description: Classic fighter jet inspiration with bold red accents, reflective tongue, and a design built to stand out.

name: Air Jordan 6 Infrared
description: Championship-ready sneaker with visible Air cushioning, sculpted midsole, and striking infrared highlights.

name: Air Jordan 7 Bordeaux
description: Geometric design lines with Bordeaux accents, offering a luxurious retro aesthetic and lightweight comfort.

name: Air Jordan 8 Aqua
description: Bold straps, vibrant Aqua colorway, and premium cushioning make this one of the most iconic Jordan releases.

name: Air Jordan 9 Space Jam
description: Global-inspired design worn by MJ in Space Jam, blending nostalgia with premium craftsmanship and comfort.

name: Air Jordan 10 Chicago
description: Celebrating MJ’s return with Chicago pride, featuring premium leather and outsole stripes honoring his career milestones.
